content: Dear Parent, your child's application has been successfully submitted. We will get back to you once we complete the review process. - Admissions Coordinator, Santhosha Vidhyalaya

template_name: E Fee Management - donation from Sponsor
content: Dear Sponsor, thank you for your generous contribution. Your receipt has been sent to your registered email or it will be sent shortly - Santhosha Vidhyalaya

template_name: E Hostel Admission - application by parent
content: Dear Parent, we have received your hostel admission application . Our team will review it and get back to you shortly. – Santhosha Vidhyalaya

template_name: E Hostel Admission - update Status of hostel application
content: Dear Parent, Your child’s hostel admission has been confirmed. Further details will be shared shortly. – Santhosha Vidhyalaya
Dear Parent, your child's mark list has been updated. Please log in to the app or website to view the latest academic results. – Santhosha Vidhyalaya
Dear Parent, Your child is unwell and is under our utmost care. For updates, please contact the Warden or Hostel Health Care Worker. - Santhosha Vidhyalya
Dear Parent, We have received your message and responded accordingly. The matter is now resolved and the case has been closed. Thank you for reaching out. - Principal, Santhosha Vidhyalaya
